title: TOOLZEEN 6 PCS Volumizing Hair Root Clip,Natural Fluffy Hairpin, No Heat Curling Iron Hair Styling Tool Rollers,DIY Curler Hair Styling Small And Easy to Carry, for Long & Short Hair
description: Hair Lift Volumizing Root ClipNo more flat, limp lifeless hair!Hair Volumizing Root Clip lifts hair from roots and creates naturally big, voluminous hair without heat, hair spray or extensions.Setting hair in an upright position from roots, these clips form plumping layers to create a thicker hair look.The comb edges of the clip securely fix hair while the vent holes allow hot air to pass through for faster styling using a hairdryer.Simply clip on, do your makeup/skincare, and let down to get bouncy, lifted hair effortlessly!How to use1.Select the right amount of hair, the hairpin clamps the root of the hair, and the serrations need to be perpendicular to the scalp2.Use the hairdryer to blow for 3-5 minutes, then the shelf can be disassembled.3.It is necessary to smooth the hair when it is removed, and it is best to use a styling spray.4.After the above operations, your hairstyle is basically completed, you only need to make subtle adjustments. The first operation may not be able to achieve the desired effect. Try a few times and you will find what a magical clip this is.
